Text: The only books in this torrent that are 3rd edition Earthdawn books are Player's Guide and Gamemaster's Guide. The rest are EDC (Earthdawn Classic - Redbricks remake of FASA's ED a.k.a First Edition)

Content:

Player's Guide (3ED)
Player's Compendium (EDC)
Gamemaster's Guide (3ED)
Gamemaster's Compendium (EDC)
Namegiver's Compendium (3ED)
Shard: A Journey to Land (EDC)
Shard: Runvir's Tomb (EDC)
Shard: Tournament Troubles (EDC)
Spell Library (3ED)
